entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 06 March 2023
